content: In constant currency, sales grew 6%, reflecting 10% growth from pricing actions, partially offset by a 1% decline from the Kitchen Basics divestiture and 1% decline attributable to the exit of low-margin business in India and the consumer business in Russia and a 2% decline in all other volume and product mix.
